EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Introducing the Java DSL for Spring Integration.Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Introducing the Java DSL for Spring Integration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for this week's webinar Introducing the Java DSL for Spring Integration.
If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, January 27, 2015 Europe: 3:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=ea2f3f84bbdbc711bc0a33de26f44b4be> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 669 478 469 Thank you,
